Others: Bam Adebayo had a significant bounce-back game after struggling in the first two games of January.
Jaime Jaquez Jr. had back-to-back good games in the starting lineup, averaging better statistics when Jimmy Butler is not playing.
Nikola Jovic continued his breakout season with another dominant performance, despite a slightly off night from three-point range.
The Heat remain undefeated when Alec Burks is utilized as a major part of the rotation, with a perfect 4-0 record when he plays at least 25 minutes.
